description: Modiphius Entertainment has announced an upcoming Kickstarter campaign for Discworld: Adventures in Ankh-Morpork, a new tabletop roleplaying game based on Terry Pratchett’s iconic Discworld series. The campaign is set to launch on October 15. This marks the first time in over two decades that a new Discworld RPG will be published, following the release of...
title: Modiphius to Launch Kickstarter for New Discworld Tabletop RPG on October 15

description: This week’s Warmachine Wednesday update from Steamforged Games introduces new content, including the rules for two character solos, Captain Bastian Falk and Sergeant Goran Lazarenko, the Jackal, as well as the latest subscriber-only Battle Forge scenario, Grim Harvest. With Halloween approaching, this update brings a seasonal theme to the game. Captain Bastian Falk offers leadership...
title: New Character Solos and Battle Forge Scenario for Warmachine

description: Red Raven Games has launched Above and Below: Haunted, a standalone sequel to Above and Below, on Gamefound. Set to celebrate the 10th anniversary of the original game, Above and Below: Haunted introduces players to a haunted marshland setting, with opportunities to explore watery caves and build new villages. In this sequel, players compete to...
title: Explore Haunted Marshlands in Red Raven Games’ Above and Below: Haunted

description: Black Cats Gaming has released its latest roleplaying game, Cursed Captains of Cthulhu, now available in PDF on the official website, DriveThruRPG, and itch.io. Developed by James Barry, the game combines elements of piracy during the Golden Age with themes from the Cthulhu mythos. Players are tasked with assembling crews to explore the Caribbean, facing...
title: “Cursed Captains of Cthulhu” RPG Brings Pirates and Cthulhu Mythos Together in New PDF Release

description: Japanime Games has launched a Kickstarter campaign for An’Imaria: Domains of Destiny, a nearly 500-page anime-inspired 5E setting guide. Drawing inspiration from popular anime like One Piece, Frieren, and Solo Leveling, An’Imaria aims to bring the vibrant worlds of anime to your Dungeons & Dragons campaigns. The campaign, which also includes the adventure book An’Imaria...
title: Japanime Games Brings Anime to D&D with An’Imaria Kickstarter Campaign

description: MIR, a dark fantasy TTRPG by Little Dusha, is currently live on Kickstarter. With its haunting narrative set in a world struggling against the encroaching Ruin, MIR offers players a unique journey through moral dilemmas, trauma, and dark intrigue—where every decision carries a weight that can shape reality itself. The game, which is pronounced as...
title: MIR: An Interview with the Creators of the Dark Fantasy TTRPG on Trauma, Healing, Art and Black Metal

description: Creative Jam Games has launched Capybattle on Gamefound, a two-player board game where players assume the role of capybara monarchs. In the game, players work to control five quarters in a row by leading capybara knights and constructing various structures. Each turn, actions are activated based on the placement of capybara monarchs, with options that...
title: Capybattle: Lead Capybara Monarchs to Victory in Creative Jam Games’ New Strategy Board Game

description: The latest video from the official Dungeons & Dragons channel has provided an overview of the upcoming changes to the 2024 Dungeon Master’s Guide. Players can expect new magic items and expanded crafting rules, offering more customization in their adventures. The new Dungeon Master’s Guide chapter focuses on different types of treasure, ranging from coins...
title: New Magic Items and Crafting Rules Revealed for the 2024 Dungeon Master’s Guide

description: Wicked Christmas is a holiday-themed strategy card game where players compete to end with the lowest score by destroying their presents. Set in a whimsical Christmas world, the game combines fast-paced action with elements of strategy and surprise. Players take turns playing cards from their hands, trying to match or play a lower card than...
title: Wicked Christmas: A Fast-Paced Holiday Card Game Full of Sabotage and Festive Fun

description: Triad Trouble in the “Paris of the East” Publisher: Modiphius Entertainment Release Date: September 19th, 2024 Links: Modiphius, DriveThruRPG At a glance Achtung! Cthulhu 2d20: Operation Oberon takes players to the bustling streets of Shanghai in January 1943. With Imperial Japanese forces controlling the city and the sinister Black Sun faction seeking occult treasures, this...
title: Achtung! Cthulhu 2d20: Operation Oberon Review

description: The BBC Archive has shared a nostalgic gem on YouTube the Heart of the Matter series. In the clip from 1980, viewers can watch legendary game designers Albie Fiore and Steve Jackson from Games Workshop, delve into the world of Dungeons & Dragons during the early days of the tabletop role-playing scene. Originally broadcast on...
title: Watch Albie Fiore and Steve Jackson Play D&D in 1980
